Description:
How do you like your Shabbat brisket? We love ours with beer—and some blessings too.

Whatever your preference, you’re invited to join Rabbis Paulette Posner and Hayley Siegel for a delicious Friday night of quaffing, kibitzing and chowing down as only the 92Y community can do.

For a vegetarian option, please call 212.699.7204.
ShortDesc: How do you like your Shabbat brisket? We love ours with beer—and some blessings too.
Title: Brisket, Beer and Blessings

Description:
Please join the Rabbi Paulette and Connect staff for our Connect Jewish After-School Shabbat Dinners!

We will have two fantastic nights of food, stories, songs and games!

Friday, November 7, 2014. Please join us for Latin inspired food and night!

Friday, March 20, 2015 please join us for Sushi fun and roll your own dessert!

Please register in advance and join the Connect program for two meaningful and fun Shabbat evenings.
ShortDesc: Please join the Rabbi Paulette and Connect staff for our Connect Jewish After-School Shabbat Dinners!
Title: 92Y Connect Jewish Education Family Shabbat Dinners

Description:
Wear your favorite costume to this topsy-turvy Shabbat dinner where fun and silly things will happen!

Enjoy yummy kosher Chinese food, singing and our costume parade.

Everyone attending must have a ticket.

Description:
Bring you family to celebrate Passover with 92Y as we recreate the meaningful and ancient traditions with yours songs, stories, movements and games.

Vegetarian meal options available by phone registration only, please call 212.415.5500.

For families with children up to 12 yrs.

Free for children under the age of one.

Everyone attending must have a ticket.

Description:
Get ready for Shabbat with a joyous and active musical experience!

Children, parents, grandparents and nannies are all a part of our Shababa Friday family. Join us for this playful and soulful experience of singing, dancing, jumping and celebrating as a community!

Ongoing on Fridays, Session One: 9:30-10:15 am / Session Two: 10:45-11:30 am.

Single Ticket Price: $15 Adult / Children Free.

Please note: There are no Shababa Fridays during the month of July. Shababa Fridays will return in August at 10 am only and we will return to 9:30 am and 10:45 am sessions in September.

Ten-Shababa™ Card

Four-Shababa™ Card

This event is first come, first served. Please arrive early to ensure entry.
MobileDesc: Get ready for Shabbat with a joyous and active musical experience!
ShortDesc: Get ready for Shabbat with a joyous and active musical experience!

Description:
What does Shabbat smell like? What does Shabbat taste like?

The Shababa bakery is much more than braiding Challah dough. It’s about feeling the squishy dough in your hands and smelling the scent of fresh challah baking in your home. It’s about tasting the warm bread with your family on Friday night. These are the things that children remember. No child is too young for the Shababa Bakery because you are not just making bread; you are making memories of Shabbat with your children. Join us for this fun and truly sweet experience!

 

$15 Child / Adults Free
MobileDesc: What does Shabbat smell like? What does Shabbat taste like?
ShortDesc: What does Shabbat smell like? What does Shabbat taste like?
Title: Shababa™ Bakery (Adults Free)

Title: 92Y Connect Jewish Education Family Shabbat Dinners

Description:
Sing, dance and celebrate the joys of Shabbat with this intergenerational family experience!

Filled with traditional and non-traditional music, creative prayer, art, movement and more, Shababa Saturdays provides meaningful experiences in a relaxed and playful environment. Shababa Saturdays welcomes families with babies, toddlers and older children. No prior experience celebrating Shabbat necessary. Sing, dance and celebrate as a community!

Sat, ongoing, 10:30 am-12 pm, FREE.
 

Plus, now families can host a Shababa brunch!

As a part of Shababa Saturdays, families may host a community brunch or slice into a yummy personalized cake surrounded by family and friends! Celebrate your special event Shababa style—with music, hugs, Karina, Rebecca and CoCo!

Email Melissa Cole for details!
ShortDesc: Sing, dance and celebrate the joys of Shabbat with this intergenerational family experience!
Title: Shababa Saturdays - Free
